channel.title: Comments for page "Copper Slag"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Copper Slag"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: the only thing i can think of is future content. other than that the cobalt sliver is used in upgrading a piece of PizzaWitch gear.

item.title: Purpose?
item.content:encoded:
Is there a purpose to the Copper Slag, Copper Dust and Copper Sliver items?
From their pages, I can't find one. You can only get them by distilling larger items,
and they have no use other than creating the items they were distilled from.

Obviously my question also applies to Silver and Cobalt items of the same kind.
